item.description:
Join NHC'er John for the annual chili cookoff and beer festival at Delaney's to benefit the American Cancer Society!

On hand will be 90 different kinds of beer to sample and lots of different kinds of chili. Bands will be providing live musical entertainment, and the side street will be blocked off to accomodate the surging masses.

Tickets are $35 at the door or $30 in advance. To purchase tickets or to find out how to enter your own chili in the cook-off, call Delaney's at (203) 397-5494

Your contact for the event, John, can be reached at 203-500-1039.

Rumor has it that the beer flows freely at this event, so please drink responsibly and arrange for safe transportation.
item.name: Chili Cookoff and Beer Festival at Delaney's
